name.ja: <ruby>歴<rt>れき</rt></ruby><ruby>戦<rt>せん</rt></ruby>の<ruby>暗<rt>あん</rt></ruby><ruby>黒<rt>こく</rt></ruby><ruby>騎<rt>き</rt></ruby><ruby>士<rt>し</rt></ruby>ガイア

summoning_condition.en: You can Tribute Summon this card in Attack Position by Tributing 1 face-up Level 5 or higher monster.

requirement.en: Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.

effect.en: This card's name becomes "Gaia The Fierce Knight" this turn. Then, you can Fusion Summon by shuffling this card from your field and 1 monster from your field or Graveyard into the owner's Deck as material.
